ratings.comment: Van Fleet was a fantastic instructor! She walks through every step of the process from researching to creating an effective slideshow. Her expectations and feedback are clear. If you look at the rubrics and feedback, and follow them when completing assignments, an A is easy.

I took her class online over the summer. It was her first online course and she did a great job. The class is very simple and only has 3 projects they are not graded harshly making the class easy to do well in. Nice person and good teacher.

There are 3 projects for the entire class. If you don't get an A I would be shocked, she gives you great feedback and says exactly what she expects of you. She is also super friendly and caring. Great person and teacher.
